snippet: Beginning with the Disney film “Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day,” Common Sense Media plans to award its seal to as many as 10 family-friendly films a year.
abstract: Watchdog group Common Sense Media plans to award its approval seal to as many as 10 family-friendly films a year; first seal will go to Walt Disney's Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day.
lead_paragraph: Beginning with the Disney film “Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day,” Common Sense Media plans to award its seal to as many as 10 family-friendly films a year.

headline.main: Movie Watchdog Group Gives Out Its First Seal of Approval
headline.print_headline: Movie Watchdog Group Gives Out Its First Seal of Approval

keywords.value: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works
